name: São Paulo like you've never seen! By Pedro Rodrigues
description: With a background in adventure, I can provide what best fits each traveler, always with safety and care. From a pleasant afternoon in a park, even watch a football game, a walk within communities (Favela), or just a picnic after practicing yoga or an afternoon at the gym the hotel. The eclectic and chaotic NightLife of São Paulo, the city of bars, ballads, party's, religions, tribes and villages.
